name: Pumpking Over It
description:
PUMPKING OVER IT

Game participating in the "Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin"

-Pumpking Over It is a short challenging arcade video game created in just 3 days for the "Mini Jam 89" 

-includes 5 levels

-dynamic interface

-retro graphics with lighting

-HOW TO PLAY?

-You simply have to drag and drop anywhere on the screen to move the pumpkin

It will soon be available for android!
